title: Streamable
description: Streamable is the easiest way to upload and share videos online. Millions rely on Streamable to host their videos, either on Streamable or embedded on their websites. Our customers often use Streamable as a simpler and faster option than Vimeo and Wistia. The price is cut in half, the features are simpler and easier to use, and there are no ads that distract your viewers. With Streamable, you get up to 8x faster video uploads at high-quality video resolution in a professional video player.
